title: Harmony on the Rift MIssion
body: I have played over 10  SR missions and it will not update, Is this a different icon then DawnBringer because I only got   Riven and Yasao. Plz help I only have 9 hrs to get this sorted. If it's the Icon that's showing in that picture, I did not get it.

replies.body:
Any of the special Order icons should work for those missions. That image is actually just the image used for that mission, not an icon. 

I went ahead and checked, and it looks like you were able to get that missions completed!
I have the same problem as well
I've also had a problem with this mission. It does not get completed. I've played Summoner's Rift Ranked and Blind. And still it doesn't get completed. It's bugged I think!
You must play summoner's rift. blind pick. or ranked. something from that. not aram.
